page.title: 01WELCOME TO SANDBACH
page.content: SANDBACH IS SITUATED IN SOUTH CHESHIRE WHERE THE PENNINES MEET THE CHESHIRE PLAIN. IT HAS A{POPULATION}OF 14,747.{ {INDUSTRIES }LIKE SALT AND HEAVY COMMERCIAL VEHICLE MANUFACTURE CAN BE FOUND AND HAVE EASY ACCESS TO THE M6 ONLY A MILE FROM THE TOWN CENTRE. SANDBACH IS A THRIVING{MARKET}TOWN AND IS THE VENUE OF ONE OF THE LARGEST STREET MARKETS IN THE NORTH-WEST DATING BACK TO 1579.{TOURISTS}VISIT THE TWO SAXON CROSSES WHICH STAND IN THE ORIGINAL MARKET PLACE. OUR BLOCK IS LARGELY RURAL AND IS SITUATED TO THE NORTH AND EAST OF SANDBACH TOWN CENTRE.
